required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Genetic Predisposition to Breast and Ovarian Cancer: Prospective Study of BRCAx Gene Mutation
clinical_study.official_title: Genetic Predisposition to Breast and Ovarian Cancer: Prospective Study of BRCAx Gene Mutation

collaborator.agency: UNICANCER - Le Groupe génétique et cancer (GGC)

brief_summary.textblock: Cohort of subjects carrying a BRCA gene mutation: genetic predispositions to breast and ovarian cancers

detailed_description.textblock: Cohort of subjects carrying a BRCA gene mutation: genetic predispositions to breast and ovarian cancers

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of breast and / or ovarian cancer during subject lifetime
primary_outcome.description: risk that a subject with a mutation develops breast and / or ovarian cancer during his lifetime, assessed by epidemiologic questionnaires (carcinologic events).

arm_group.arm_group_label: subjects carrying a BRCA gene mutation
arm_group.description: subjects carrying a BRCA gene mutation

intervention.description: standardized data collection and 10-year prospective follow-up
intervention.arm_group_label: subjects carrying a BRCA gene mutation

study_pop.textblock: women and men with a BRCA1 or BRCA2 mutation

criteria.textblock:
1. Woman or man, with or without cancer, carrying a deleterious BRCA1/BRCA2 mutation, aged 18 years and over.
1. Woman with or without breast cancer or ovarian cancer at baseline.
2. Man with or without breast cancer at baseline.
2. Signed consent to participation
3. Affiliation to a social security regimen, or beneficiary of such a regimen.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. A person of legal age subject to a legal protection measure, or unable to express consent.
2. Impossibility to submit to the follow-up of the test for geographical, social or psychological reasons

link.description: Description de la cohorte GENEPSO au sein du Portail Epidémiologie-France
